title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. III, pt. 104 - Orders Designating Institutions To Which Persons Returned To Institutions Under Jurisdiction Of State Department Of Correctional Services For Violation Of Parole Or Conditional Or Other Release Are To Be Delivered
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. III, pt. 104 - Orders Designating Institutions To Which Persons Returned To Institutions Under Jurisdiction Of State Department Of Correctional Services For Violation Of Parole Or Conditional Or Other Release Are To Be Delivered

State Regulations
§ 104.1 - Male parole and conditional release violators
§ 104.2 - Female parole and conditional release violators
§ 104.3 - Transfer of parole and conditional release violators

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. III, pt. 104

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§70, 71, 112, 138

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
